scripts.pd: cd $INIT_CWD && find . -type f -name '*.md' -maxdepth 1 -execdir sh -c 'pandoc -s --template=GitHub.html5  --toc --toc-depth=3 -f markdown+example_lists+fenced_code_blocks+fenced_code_attributes+tex_math_single_backslash+tex_math_dollars --mathjax -t html5 --filter pandoc-plantuml  "${0}" -o "${0%.md}.html"' {} \;
scripts.pd_pdf: cd $INIT_CWD && find . -type f -name '*.md' -maxdepth 1 -execdir sh -c 'pandoc -s -f markdown+example_lists+fenced_code_blocks+fenced_code_attributes+tex_math_single_backslash+tex_math_dollars --mathjax -t pdf --filter pandoc-plantuml  "${0}" -o "${0%.md}.pdf"' {} \;
